data.name: VR Bottle Shooter
data.description:
Do flawless marksmanship to be victorious in bottle shooter game. 

Different riffles like grenade launcher, Assault Rifle, Sniper Rifle, Bravo Squad Assault rifle, etc. Have fun and excitement with VR gaming mode. Experience the most unique and Action-packed game in VR. Tremendous game play with different Guns. Experience the shoot bottles in Realistic way. Beautiful 3D graphic Visualization and Addictive gaming Mode. Complete levels and win amazing Gaming points. Easy Controls for Aim and smash the bottles. Enjoy the real sound of glass breaking and guns.

Key Features: 
~Different ranges guns
~VR Smart gaming view
~Addictive gameplay
~3D visualization graphics
~Many Unique and Complicated levels
~Real sound of Glass Breaking
~Real Target Bottle Shooting
~Easy and smooth controls for shoot the bottle

Play like professional sport player and complete all tough levels in Energetic way.

Shoot and broke the bottles and Show off your Marvelous Marksmanship in real.
